text: Fred Hawkins (September 3, 1923 â€“ December 6, 2014) was an American professional golfer. He played on the PGA Tour from the mid-1940s to the mid-1960s. Hawkins was born in Antioch, Illinois. Hawkins died in Sebring, Florida, aged 91.' ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American golfers Category:Sportspeople from Illinois
